text: Matam adudagi houna Jisuna mahakki tung-inbasingda mangonda thokkadabasing adu khanghanba hourammi. Ibungona hairak-i, “Eihakna Jerusalem-da chatpa tai aduga ahal-lamansinggi, athoiba purohitsing amadi Wayel Yathanggi ojasinggi makhuttagi awa-ana kaya ama khaangba tai. Aduga makhoina eihakpu hatkani adubu humni suba numitta eina sibadagi hinggatkani.”
